title: Citibank Bahrain Named Winner in Global Finance Magazine's Awards for "Best Internet Bank" and "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank"
summary: Manama, Bahrain - Citibank Bahrain has won the "Best Consumer Internet Bank" and the "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank" awards in the first round of Global Finance magazine's awards for the 2013 Best Internet Banks in the Middle East and Africa.
tag-1: Citibank Bahrain Named Winner in Global Finance Magazine's Awards for "Best Internet Bank" and "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank"
tag-2: Manama, Bahrain – Citibank Bahrain has won the "Best Consumer Internet Bank" and the "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank" awards in the first round of Global Finance magazine's awards for the 2013 Best Internet Banks in the Middle East and Africa.
tag-3: This is the second year that Citibank Bahrain has won the "Best Consumer Internet Bank" award; it earned the same award in 2011.
tag-4: Citi's branches in Egypt, U.A.E., Kuwait, Lebanon, Jordan, Tunisia, Algeria and Morocco were named winners in the magazine's award for "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Bank" in their respective markets.
tag-5: Winners were chosen among entries evaluated by a world-class panel of judges at Infosys. Global Finance editors were responsible for the final selection of winners in the First Round.
tag-6: According to Global Finance: "Winning banks were selected based on the following criteria: strength of strategy for attracting and servicing online customers, success in getting clients to use web offerings, growth of online customers, breadth of product offerings, evidence of tangible benefits gained from Internet initiatives, and web site design and functionality."
tag-7: Mazin Manna, Citi Country Officer for Bahrain, said: "We are pleased to receive both awards this year and for winning the Best Consumer Internet Bank award for the second time from Global Finance. There is a great amount of effort and time that the team dedicates towards our online banking service and web site functionality. These awards tell us that we are on the right track and are a strong recognition of our capabilities and the service we provide to our clients in Bahrain."
tag-8: Global Finance is an international finance magazine with a circulation in more than 163 countries. The magazine covers a wide spectrum of subjects including corporate financing, capital markets, monetary policies, banking operations and risk management.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
